full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement

#### Title
SSC UAT Tender 6 - PA Recall to Pending Approval & PA Approves Overnight (V3.0)

#### Trade Agreement
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
New Brunswick

#### Region of Delivery
Saskatchewan

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Solicitation Number
BPM011416/13162

#### Reference Number
SSC-23-00013162:T

#### Tender Closing Date
August 2, 2021, 9:00 am

#### Contact Information
GianMarco DeMeis (Admin)

* Phone: 613-999-9999
* Fax: 613-999-9999
* Address: 11 Rue Laurier, Gatineau, Québec A1A 1A1, Canada

### Tender Description
This tender is used to test the procurement process of recalling a tender to pending approval and subsequent re-approval overnight. The objective is to ensure that the process meets the required standards and timing. This tender is a substitute for Tender 3, which had a missed timing issue. This is the third iteration of the tender document (V3.0), with a total of zero amendments.

### Attachment
No attachments are provided.

### Notice URL
Not available.

### Confidentiality
The information contained in this notice must not be disseminated or shared with any third party without prior written consent from the contracting authority.

Note
----

*   The format of this text has been changed to enhance readability.
*   The formatting was done using markdown, and emphasis on headers was added for better understanding.
*   The GIF code was not included as it was not part of the original textual entry.
*   Minor formatting changes have been done to cater to the 400-word limit.
